svg.title: Market & Submarket Analysis — Phase 4 Deep Dive
svg.desc: Institutional-grade market intelligence workflow showing six data source categories feeding into four analysis layers that produce comprehensive market conclusions. Demonstrates the extraordinary depth of research in Phase 4 of the pinchfin underwriting workflow.
svg.text: PHASE 4 DEEP DIVE — INSTITUTIONAL-GRADE MARKET INTELLIGENCE
Phase 4 produces institutional-grade market intelligence. Every conclusion is sourced, every trend is quantified,
every risk is identified before a single dollar of cash flow is modeled.
5 Deliverables (30+ page report + risk score + forecast)
